ResourceHeader.Description:
Lockheed Martin Solar and Astrophysics Laboratory
(LMSAL) provides multiple access paths to a variety of SDO (Solar 
Dynamics Observatory)/AIA (Atmospheric Imaging Assembly) digital and 
display solar images and movies, as well as to tools (e.g., the 
Heliophysics Events Knowledgebase, HEK) for selecting and viewing
data.  Data include full-disk, 1-arcsec-resolution solar images taken 
in each of 10 UV/EUV wavelengths every 10 seconds.

InformationURL.Name: AIA top web page at Lockheed

AccessURL.Name: AIA data access page at LMSAL
AccessURL.Description:
Selection of digital and browse AIA data products and access 
paths

AccessURL.Name: VSO path to SDO data
AccessURL.Description:
VSO path to JSOC-resident SDO HMI and AIA data files;
JSOC is Joint Science Operations Center at Stanford U.
